title: Shanthi Indian and Sri Lankan Cuisine
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Sri Lankan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family-run Sri Lankan and South Indian restaurant. Offers some veg, dishes including dosa. Inexpensive vegetarian buffet at lunchtimes and Saturday evenings. Also operates an Indian store attached to the restaurant. Short walk from the main street and west train station in Interlaken.
